help=

	settings=\n\n[:rel:top]\n----\n+++ Settings\n++++ Options\n[:page:InsertPage]\n\n[:rel:top]\n----\n[:page:InsertPage]
	page footer;a=\n[:rel:top]\n----\nprevious: [:rel:back]\nparents:&nbsp; [:rel:parents; aslist]\nattributes: [tree_position: 1]\n[help.status:new]

intro=
	page header=\nContents:\t[:toc:]\n[:rel:back]\n----\n+++ General\n.... text ....\n\n[:rel:top]\n----\n+++ Details\n
	page footer;a=<p align=center>[PageLink |&laquo; Previous page]&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;[PageLink |Next page &raquo;]</p>----\nprevious: [:rel:back]\nparents:&nbsp; [:rel:parents; aslist]\nattributes: [tree_position: 1]\n[intro.status:new]

footnote=
	reference=<small><sup>[1]</sup></small>
	text=\n<small><i>[1] .... Footnote text ....</i></small>

new wiki=
